item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @Jazzelhawk Jazzelhawk
item.description:
@Jazzelhawk wrote:

Ok I get this error:

Compiling new/com/codeusa/Engine.java src\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java:994: non-static method game( } connot be referenced from a static context DiceGame.game(); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I don’t know why…
I also have this in commands:

if (cmd[0].equals("diceme")){ int amountDiced = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); if (amountDiced > pi.invItemCount(p, 995)){ p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You dont have enough money to bet that much!"); }else{ p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You roll the dice"); DiceGame.game(); } }

I have imported DiceGame.java but I don’t know how to get it to run the method “game”… Can anyone help please me on this?
